i18n.key: If this option is not activated, all of the brands will be displayed on a single page. If, on the other hand, it is activated, there will be one page for each letter, which itself will be paged if necessary.
Show or hide the detailed information (visual element and description) for the brands in the list.
If defined, the list of brands will be limited to the brands having products in the selected top-level shelf.
